languages.text: "Башмак — чудесная вещь. Он тебе и обувь, и тарелка, и подушка... Даже подошву пожевать можно в час нужды!"

traits.locale_text: "Башмак — чудесная вещь. Он тебе и обувь, и тарелка, и подушка... Даже подошву пожевать можно в час нужды!"

languages.text: "A shoe's a wonderful thing. It's your shoe, and your plate, and your pillow... You can even chew on the sole if you're desperate!"
languages.original_text: "Башмак — чудесная вещь. Он тебе и обувь, и тарелка, и подушка... Даже подошву пожевать можно в час нужды!"

traits.locale_text: "A shoe is a wonderful thing. It is your shoes, and a plate, and a pillow ... You can even chew the sole in an hour of need!"
"A shoe is a wonderful thing. It is your shoes, and a plate, and a pillow ... You can even chew the sole in an hour of need!"
"A shoe's a wonderful thing. It's your shoe, and your plate, and your pillow... You can even chew on the sole if you're desperate!"
"A shoe's a wonderful thing. It's your shoe, and your plate, and your pillow... You can even chew on the sole if you're desperate!"

languages.text: 「靴ってのは素晴らしいもんだ。靴にもなるし、皿にもなれば枕にもなる…必要なら靴底を噛むことだってできる！」
languages.original_text: "A shoe's a wonderful thing. It's your shoe, and your plate, and your pillow... You can even chew on the sole if you're desperate!"

traits.locale_text: 「靴ってのは素晴らしいもんだ。靴にもなるし、皿にもなれば枕にもなる…必要なら靴底を噛んでることだってできる！」

languages.text: « C'est merveilleux, une chaussure. C'est à la fois une chaussure, une assiette, un oreiller... On peut même mâchouiller la semelle si on est vraiment désespéré ! »
languages.original_text: "A shoe's a wonderful thing. It's your shoe, and your plate, and your pillow... You can even chew on the sole if you're desperate!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est merveilleux, une chaussure. C'est à la fois une chaussure, une assiette, un oreiller... On peut même mâchouiller la semelle si on est vraiment désespéré ! »

languages.text: “鞋真是个好东西，既可以当鞋穿，又可以当盘子用，还能当枕头枕……真要饿死的时候，还可以啃鞋底。”
languages.original_text: "A shoe's a wonderful thing. It's your shoe, and your plate, and your pillow... You can even chew on the sole if you're desperate!"

traits.locale_text: “鞋真是个好东西，既可以当鞋穿，又可以当盘子用，还能当枕头枕……真要饿死的时候，还可以啃鞋底。”

languages.text: "Ein Schuh ist etwas Wundervolles. Er ist ein Schuh, ein Teller und ein Kissen ... Und in der Not kann man sogar auf der Sohle herumkauen!"
languages.original_text: "A shoe's a wonderful thing. It's your shoe, and your plate, and your pillow... You can even chew on the sole if you're desperate!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein Schuh ist etwas Wundervolles. Er ist ein Schuh, ein Teller und ein Kissen ... Und in der Not kann man sogar auf der Sohle herumkauen!"

languages.text: «Los zapatos son maravillosos. Un zapato sirve como calzado, como plato, como almohada... ¡Hasta puedes masticar la suela en momentos de necesidad!».
languages.original_text: "A shoe's a wonderful thing. It's your shoe, and your plate, and your pillow... You can even chew on the sole if you're desperate!"

traits.locale_text: «Los zapatos son maravillosos. Zapatos, un plato, una almohada... ¡Hasta puedes masticar la suela en momentos de necesidad!».

languages.text: "Ayakkabı müthiş bir şey ya. Ayağına giyiyorsun, tabak veya yastık niyetine kullanıyorsun. Çok çaresiz kalırsan da tabanlarını kemirebiliyorsun!"
languages.original_text: "A shoe's a wonderful thing. It's your shoe, and your plate, and your pillow... You can even chew on the sole if you're desperate!"

traits.locale_text: "Ayakkabı harika bir şey. Ayakkabın oluyor, tabağın oluyor, yastığın oluyor... Çok çaresiz kalırsan tabanlarını kemirebilirsin!"
